lead_paragraph: OSTREICH--Ellen S.,88, of Lake Mary, Florida (former resident of New York and Boca Raton, Florida), passed away on January 2, 2016. Born January 14, 1927 to Rose Lehman Stein, Esq. and Simon Stein, M.D. Graduated from Cornell University in 1946 and received M.A. in 1947 from New York University. Beloved wife of the late Leonard L. Ostreich, M.D. Beloved mother to Marjorie (Dustan) Smith, Richard, M.D. (Helene) Ostreich, Steven (Andrea) Ostreich and Peter Ostreich (deceased) and Glenda. Adored grandmother to nine, Carey, Jordan, Tamara, Amy, Debbie, Rachel, Danielle, Stacey and Emily and adored great-grandmother to five, Chloe, Myles, Jeremy, Mason and Lily. The funeral service will be on January 5, 2016 at 12:00pm at Gutterman's Memorial Chapel, 8000 Jericho Turnpike, Woodbury, New York. Family requests donations be made to Vitas Healthcare (Hospice) or Boys Town Jerusalem. 1/3
